Blog.post: hey , john here .... :P my first msg ... -_-" lolx... today is SAT so sian ar need to go back school for rememdial the cher tok alot then laugh laugh onli never really study sia lolx... all the tzu yu fault la ... make me laugh so much ... lolx... after rememdial go eat mac wif wei chang haizzz call the tzu yu go he don wan so zuai sia idiot.... lolx... some things are botherin me these few days so fan sia... wan to exam liao scare scare ... wish all students from bgss n all the friends i noe all the best la wish u all can get good grades ... though i noe it is veri diffcult to setter down to study but try ur best n have good grades especially sec 2 n sec 4 havin major exam soon ... all the best la .. good luck :P (",) i write till here buai buai :P ... lolx ...

yoz,mi back liao sorry tt tis few days never write here .... :p busy ar so sorri ar friends .... my friends they all keep callin me update my blogger so now let me update .... lolx.... first muz thanks my mei for helpin me put the pic but the things tt u type mayb abit toopid ... lolx.... sorry ar .... today veri sian ... start exam liao ... need to study for exam or else i die till veri zia liat .... lol .... keke.... ahmmm today run 2.4 veri happy sia i never really run coz my shoe veri loose scare later fly out then i juz jog without stoppin they wan to finnish liao they i chong then haha i got 5th in classs sia .... 11 .14 lolx... so happy they toopid tzu yu run so fast got second in class with the record of 10 .... lolx... si bei sian ar tml geo need to study alot sia... today never go bball trainin coz mum don let ...lol .... wan to go also cann but i think thurs i can go liao so no fear ... lolx.... veri stupid sia listenin to engery ablum , sittin infront of the comp searchin 4 inspiration donnoe wat to write sia i write too short also cann later they say so short n i wan my blogg to b long long 1 like my mei 1 but donnoe wat to write sia ... haizz.... today go interchange wif those toopid gals then meet jon go buy his home econ pratical thingy n guess wat earlier on saw mr teo at ntuc n shi ya go talk to him say mr teo u come here for wat then he laugh laugh then she say wat u buy sure 4D 1 rite lolx.... she so darin sia lolx... i saw mr teo i siam till donnoe where liao coz i ankle socks , no name tag n things like tt la ... lolx... so funni sia ...keke ... ahmm still got wat arr .... lolx.... nothin to write liao ... k la byez ... mei i 1 day will win u 1 u watch out... lolx... byez .. take care .....
